about_the_game:
The stasis chamber hisses softly around you. Artificial fluids built up inside your ears begin to retreat as the cryoplasm drains slowly. Breathing comes naturally, at first. And then the tickle of a hundred nanites filtering your oxygen forces a cough or two of surprise. Beneath new skin, a fresh infusion of blood pulses with the cadence of tribal drums. Your thoughts cascade and it all makes sense again. You open your eyes to the dull interior of a starship.



Apsis Online is a multi-user roguelike (MUR) set in a dark science­-fiction universe.

You are a voyager. A human, mentally and physically augmented for life in deep space. Your mission is to carve out a place for humanity among the stars. Whatever that may be. Build on and explore persistent worlds that respond to what each player does to create a shared story.



Weak governments and social upheaval has ushered in an age of dystopianism. A world in which monopolistic corporations make the rules. Having normalized space travel with advancements in genetic engineering and propulsion, humanity set out to champion the frontier in hopes of discovering a new purpose. Meet new people from within the speckled void. Enjoy the imaginative flexibility of a true multi-color text user interface. It will run on almost anything! Only a keyboard and some duct tape are required to play.

platform & aesthetics


Our native platform, RogueSpace, is a simple take on social networking. Built for speed and security by geeks for geeks who have a love for the command-line. Rendered in a sharp multi-colored ASCII style for the purist in all of us. Join the conversation!

  • Post, comment or subscribe to things you find most interesting.
  • Create a page. Invite others, share privately or with the world.
  • Toggle in and out of play sessions with ease, create or join a Frontier Company, employ others and build an empire!
  • Keep up with current events via an automated news feed.
  • No email required to register.

This service does not store sensitive user data or any information about your machine or location.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: x64
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Debian
  • Processor: x64
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Apsis Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: x64
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Apsis Online is a minimalist multi-user roguelike (MUR) in which you play a Voyager. A human, mentally and physically augmented for a new life in deep space.
